about_the_game:
Ganyang Setan Alas! The Game is a single-player shooter adapted from the film Setan Alas! by Yusron Fuadi and Anindita Suryarasmi. Set in a haunting Indonesian forest, this game plunges players into a thrilling fight for survival against relentless zombies, where resilience and agility are key.

THREE PRIMARY WEAPONS

  • Sniper Rifle: Precision kills at a distance. Perfect for taking control from afar.

  • Shotgun: Devastating close-range power for dealing with zombies up close.

  • Minigun: Lay down suppressive fire, but beware of overheating during prolonged use.

TACTICAL TOOLS & INTERACTIVE ENVIRONMENTS

  • Claymore Bombs: Obliterate hordes of zombies in one explosive moment.

  • Environmental Interactions: Use the surroundings to your advantage by igniting oil lamps to burn the Zombies.

BOSS ENCOUNTERS

  • Face unique zombie bosses with distinct attack patterns and weaknesses.

A CINEMATIC EXPERIENCE

  • Watch cinematic cutscenes that reveal the lore behind Setan Alas!

  • Explore Indonesian forest with dense vegetation, structures, and hidden secrets of Setan Alas!

  • Experience the rich 3D visuals and 4K textures

content_descriptors.notes:
Blood and Gore: Shooting and melee attacks result in visible blood splatter and realistic ragdoll physics.

Disturbing Imagery: Zombies are designed with grotesque and decayed features, creating a horror atmosphere that may be unsettling to some players.

Survival Elements: The game’s narrative explores survival against a relentless and terrifying zombie attacks that might create tension and stress.

name: Ganyang Setan Alas! The Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4-core Intel / AMD Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 Ti or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS Experience for Low-Medium Graphics Settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: 6-core Intel / AMD Processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS Experience for High Graphics Settings

short_description: Ganyang Setan Alas! The Game is a single-player shooter set in a haunted Indonesian forest, where four students, armed with a range of weapons, must survive relentless zombie attacks and escape a cursed fate.
